View On FortressMaximus.io

Raider Road Hugger - Infantry - Tactics

  1. Can I use Raider Road Hugger’s tap ability to give itself an attack bonus?
    You can, but remember that using a tap ability causes the character to become tapped. But we’ll assume you have a plan.
